languages.text: "Исповедь облегчает душу, не правда ли, сестра? Чувствуешь, как бремя стыда и позора на твоих плечах стало капельку легче? Пойдете с нами, в исповедальные камеры. Я помогу вам снять с себя тяжесть ваших грехов".

"Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."
languages.original_text: "Исповедь облегчает душу, не правда ли, сестра? Чувствуешь, как бремя стыда и позора на твоих плечах стало капельку легче? Пойдете с нами, в исповедальные камеры. Я помогу вам снять с себя тяжесть ваших грехов".

traits.locale_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your sins."

"Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your sins."

"Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

languages.text: “忏悔可以解放灵魂，是这样吧，姐妹？你有没有感觉到，你肩上的耻辱与内疚的重量似乎变得轻一些了，变得可以承受了？你们两个和我们一起去忏悔室吧，我会帮助你们减轻过错所带来的负担。”
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: “忏悔可以解放灵魂，是这样吧，姐妹？你有没有感觉到，你肩上的耻辱与内疚的重量似乎变得轻一些了，变得可以承受了？你们两个和我们一起去忏悔室吧，我会帮助你们减轻罪孽所带来的负担。”

languages.text: «Las confesiones liberan el alma, ¿no es así, hermana? ¿Sientes ya cómo se levantan de tus hombros el peso de la vergüenza y la culpa? Os venís con nosotros a las celdas confesionarias. Os ayudará a libraros de la carga de vuestras transgresiones».
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: «Las confesiones liberan el alma, ¿no es así, hermana? ¿Sientes ya cómo se levantan de tus hombros el peso de la vergüenza y la culpa? Os venís con nosotros a las celdas confesionarias. Os ayudará a libraros de la carga de vuestros pecados».

languages.text: 「告白すると魂が解放されるだろう、奥さん？肩にのしかかる羞恥心と罪悪感の重みが少し軽くなるのを感じないか？お前達ふたりとも、一緒に懺悔室へ来い。罪の重荷を下ろせるように手伝ってやろう」
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: 「告白すると魂が解放されるだろう、奥さん？肩にのしかかる羞恥心と罪悪感の重みが少し軽くなるのを感じないか？お前達ふたりとも、一緒に懺悔室へ来い。罪の重荷を下ろせるように手伝ってやろう」

languages.text: "So eine Beichte befreit die Seele, nicht wahr, Schwester? Spürt Ihr, wie die Last von Schaden und Schuld auf Euren Schultern etwas leichter zu ertragen wird? Ihr beide kommt jetzt mit uns zu den Beichtzellen. Ich werde Euch helfen, Euch von der Bürde Eurer Verbrechen zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "So eine Beichte befreit die Seele, nicht wahr, Schwester? Spürt Ihr, wie die Last von Schaden und Schuld auf Euren Schultern etwas leichter zu ertragen wird? Ihr beide kommt jetzt mit uns zu den Beichtzellen. Ich werde Euch helfen, Euch von der Bürde Eurer Sünden zu befreien."

languages.text: « La confession soulage l'âme, vous n'êtes pas d'accord, ma sœur ? Ne sentez-vous pas le poids de la honte et de la culpabilité s'envoler très légèrement de vos épaules ? Vous allez nous accompagner en cellule de confession, tous les deux. Je vais vous aider à vous libérer du fardeau de vos transgressions. »
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: « La confession soulage l'âme, vous n'êtes pas d'accord, ma sœur ? Ne sentez-vous pas le poids de la honte et de la culpabilité s'envoler très légèrement de vos épaules ? Vous allez nous accompagner en cellule de confession, tous les deux. Je vais vous aider à vous libérer du fardeau de vos péchés. »

languages.text: "İtiraf etmek, içini rahatlattı mı kardeşim? Utancın ve suçluluk hissinin omuzlarına bindirdiği yük hafifledi mi? İkiniz, bizimle birlikte itiraf hücrelerine geleceksiniz. Suçlarınızın yükünden arındıracağım sizi."
languages.original_text: "Confession liberates the soul, does it not, sister? Can you feel the weight of the shame and guilt upon your shoulders becoming just a little easier to bear? You two will come with us to the confessional cells. I will help you relieve yourselves of the burden of your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmek içini rahatlatmadı mı kardeşim? Utancın ve suçluluk hissinin omuzlarına bindirdiği yük hafiflemedi mi? İkiniz bizimle birlikte itiraf hücrelerine geleceksiniz. Suçlarınızın yükünden arındıracağım sizi."
